FuncDef: The reset counters auto-primary-tunnel command is used to clear traffic statistics of MPLS TE tunnels.

ParaDef.Info:
MPLS TE tunnel automatically name.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before a statistical traffic information automatically MPLS TE tunnel within a certain period of time, it must clear the existing statistics of the tunnel before the start of the statistics, the tunnel re-count.
Precautions
After the display mpls te tunnel traffic-statistics command is run,traffic statistics are reset to 0 and cannot be restored. Therefore, confirm the action before you run the reset counters auto-primary-tunnel command.
